tool.name: PEAR Statistics
tool.description: Generate paired-end reads overlap Statistic from PEAR log file
tool.command:
#set files="" #for $index,$file in enumerate($input): #set $files += str($file)+"," #end for #set $files=$files[:-1]
#set names=','.join( [ str( $name ) for $name in $input.keys() ])
python $__tool_directory__/pear_stats.py "$files" "$names" $output
tool.help:
** what it does **
Creates summary log file by extracting "Assembled reads", "Discarded reads" and "Not assembled reads" from PEAR_ log.
.. _PEAR: https://sco.h-its.org/exelixis/web/software/pear/doc.html
